post.body: I wasn't speedy enough :(
Thanks.
Eeep! Dead bunny? Noooooo. But thank you for the thought :)
mop headed land sea lion? Wowzer!
Well I meant my birthday DAY :p I didn't get a photo of beagley :(
thanks yo :)
I GOT THE OF MONTREAL PACK THING!!!!!!
@chichiri Thank you :)
Hahaha I know exactly where you are. I could spy on you!
YUM! I love sprouts.
Hooray. Thank you.
I wish :(
he looks so cute in that uniform and the hat!
Laura and I spent quite a while discussing what we'd do in various life threatening situations where one person has to die.
I don't have any Blur on my work computer. I doubt I'll be as excited as you.
Today is going super slow :(
Oh my gosh you're crazy :p
Eeeep, not for long.
Blah twitterific is lame. I will use mobile web until twitterfon sorts itself out. I BELIEVE IN YOU TWITTERFON!
not too bad. Would have been a lot better if 2 people weren't there ha
Thank you, sir. I just finished eating one of the nectarines :)
We were waiting for our bags and they just checked my slip thing & my shoes & then gave me a green stamp :)
What's geocaching?
I don't want longer hair though!
I haven't even started.
Being lame. My usage thing didn't start over on Dec 2nd and they're being stupid about it.
uh oh
Battle Royal.
@ninjamoeba I inspire deliciousness!
Maybe something like....HAIGHS CHICOLATE?!
I'm surprised you're the only person who suggested that.
I'm trying very hard not to fall asleep on this couch in Myer.
@meganrose88 the nearby feature of Twinkle is the worst part!
not pictured: 2 x MacBooks, 3 x iPods.
@interalia @gbazz thanks for the theories! I thought teeth = money in dreams. Hmmm....
I love Twisties but it can't be disputed that they smell like cat food. I think so, @gbazz thinks so, Anna thinks so...
deeeeelicious
WHAT ABOUT THE DOORS?!
how come?
Let me know if you ever find out.
I must remember that.
I've already made an appointment at the place I usually go which is CHEAP! HA
hahaha that's his dad's legs! I think I got the kid in trouble. Woops!
sneaky!
with meeeeeee! Hurrah!
@interalia he didn't actually give me the giraffe :(
@interalia MINI GIRAFFE! http://twitpic.com/ufbz
Thank you :)
I'll still have it after I finish work though!
Uh oh, I hope she's ok. If I could I'd send you some Wizz Fizz. That makes EVERYTHING better.
Aren't we all?
I drank a Farmers Union iced coffee yesterday and thought of you hehe :p
well you got the West part at least.
BankWest is!
yummo :)
you have a lot of pillows!
It's in season 3. Maybe the fourth episode.
It is so super windy outside. I think I've finished packing except for a few things. I don't wanna gooooooo
I think Laura must have bought me a few double shot drinks at lunch. I feel way too tipsy.
I really don't like it when people say "thanking you". ARGH VOMIT.
Perfect start to my birthday-I saw the cutesy beagle puppy and it smiled at me :)
Birthday presents! Hooray! Including of Montreal super pack thing. Yayayyayay http://twitpic.com/pmpx
It doesn't even feel like my birthday is tomorrow. Is this what happens when you get old? LAME
Just bought 2 tickets to Stars. YAY I'm excited.
Laura just told me she is getting a bunny for Christmas :(
Today is going surprisingly well. I am glad. PLUS I am looking forward to tonight as well. YAY
No really, hurry up bus. This is getting ridiculous.
Hey 445, want to hurry up? I've been waiting for ages :(
My stupid iPod isn't synching :(
About to board. Goodbye Australia. I'll see you on Tuesday.
Flight delayed until 8.50. LAME
On the way to the airport. I hope New Zealand has lots of wifi.
Got my money changed. New Zealand money is awesome. http://twitpic.com/pzkb
Got my money changed. New Zealand money is awesome. http://twitpic.com/pzkb
Highlights of NZ trip so far: petting deer, Romeo + Juliet on tv. Lowlights: using 3g due to lack of wifi.
And the passive aggressive emails from my boss begin. 37 days here is too long.
Virgin Mobile...why do you keep messing everything up for me? :(
8 days of work left until Christmas break. 37 days until I'm finished there forever!
Why oh why do you keep crashing Twitterfon?
I am going to attempt to unpack while listening to Crystal Castles.
My photos from New Zealand are pretty bad. I wish I was better at taking photos :(
It is HOT in Sydney. BLAH!
Hooray! Back in Sydney at last. Only took 10 minutes to get my bags and didn't even have to go through customs YAY
Going home soon. Can't wait to be away from these people. Arrrrgh
Following @ninjamoeba's advice and drinking warm lemonade to soothe my sore throat.
Hooray! http://twitpic.com/ruru
Blur tickets on sale soon! http://twitpic.com/ruq5
6 more days of work hooray
I have a really sore throat :(
I'm getting my hair cut on Saturday. I want something different. Suggestions welcome.
I want to go to Melbourne.
My office just became bitch central.
Fifth time on hold - Blur is playing. I STILL HATE YOU VIRGIN MOBILE.
Damn you Virgin Mobile, you're making me angry.
My train smells like raw onion SLASH strong body odour. One in the same, really.
Today is not a good day. Today is a bad day.
Oh my gosh I have never ever seen someone suck up this much. I think I'm going to be sick.
Whyyyy is my wrist so sore? :(
Waiting at the hairdresses. Super nervous. Eeep
Last night I dreamt that all my teeth were falling out. It was horrible. There was also a really cute baby in my dream.
Fact: Twisties smell like cat food.
Wow. The bar girl here is a mega bitch. MEGA BITCH. Hurrah, Anna is getting Twisties.
I think I'm going to get my hair cut like this: http://tinyurl.com/5aqmjt but maybe with a straight fringe.
This kid just keeps getting better. He has Lighning Mcqueen shoes.
First toilet line: 50 million people deep. Secod toilet line (3 metres down from first): 10 people deep. Ha some people suck at life.
Awww now he has a christmas blanket and cup filled with milk. http://twitpic.com/ui7e
Now he's dancing with his American flag and his pals and standing on his chair. So adorable
This kid'll be my best friend before the night's over. He's introduced me to his pals Bobby and the nameless koala. http://twitpic.com/ui0x
Kool Thing is the funneresterest song on Guitar Hero III for realz.
I just made friends with an old man in the Oxfam shop, discussing little wooden animals. He promised me the giraffe.
Nooooooo please don't rain :(
I have to stay awake. I must watch of Montreal on Letterman. STAY AWAKE STAY AWAKE STAY AWAKE
Dessert: waffles & ice cream with homemade caramel sauce. http://twitpic.com/u5ld
Why oh why am I watching the Santa Clause 2? It's horrible :(
One of the greatest things about summer. http://twitpic.com/u4sn
Hooray! Work is over for another year.
So so sleepy. Stars were super mega awesome last night.
Twitter365 Day 3: http://is.gd/etBl
So many possibilities or maybe only three. http://twitpic.com/z9co
And you play melodica? You just keep getting betterererer. <3
Vertical stripes jacket with horizontal striped tshirt? Mr Stars, what ARE you thinking?
Dear Stars, will you marry me? All six of you? I'm ok with polygamy if you are. Love Nimi (about 12 people back, to your right)
So...Firekites are pretty lovely.
On my way to see Stars with @ninjamoeba. STARS STARS STARS. Hooray. I may or may not be drunk. You decide.
Twitter365 Day 2: http://is.gd/ep7q

Her?
